Package com.agentclient

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agentclient.AppController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller for App.FXML. Main client logic occurs here once agent has logged in.

      • updateBankInfo

        public void updateBankInfo()
        Request updated account information from bank. i.e. balance & blocked funds Updates GUI with new info. Will show alert if unable to get information.
